get.summary: List all available API operations provided by Microsoft.Dashboard.
List all resources of workspaces for Grafana under the specified subscription.
List all resources of workspaces for Grafana under the specified resource group.
Get the properties of a specific workspace for Grafana resource.

put.summary: Create or update a workspace for Grafana resource. This API is idempotent, so user can either create a new grafana or update an existing grafana.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: Operation URI for long running operation.

patch.summary: Update a workspace for Grafana resource.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: Operation URI for long running operation.

delete.summary: Delete a workspace for Grafana resource.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: Operation URI for long running operation.
Operation URI for long running operation.

get.summary: List all managed private endpoints of a grafana resource.
Get a specific managed private endpoint of a grafana resource.

put.summary: Create or update a managed private endpoint for a grafana resource.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: Operation URI for long running operation.

patch.summary: Update a managed private endpoint for an existing grafana resource.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: Operation URI for long running operation.

delete.summary: Delete a managed private endpoint for a grafana resource.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: Operation URI for long running operation.
Operation URI for long running operation.
Operation URI for long running operation.

get.summary: List all private link resources information for this grafana resource
Get specific private link resource information for this grafana resource

post.summary: Refresh and sync managed private endpoints of a grafana resource to latest state.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: Operation URI for long running operation.

IntegrationFabricNameParameter.name: integrationFabricName
IntegrationFabricNameParameter.description: The integration fabric name of Azure Managed Grafana.

ManagedPrivateEndpointNameParameter.name: managedPrivateEndpointName
ManagedPrivateEndpointNameParameter.description: The managed private endpoint name of Azure Managed Grafana.

PrivateEndpointConnectionNameParameter.name: privateEndpointConnectionName
PrivateEndpointConnectionNameParameter.description: The private endpoint connection name of Azure Managed Grafana.

WorkspaceNameParameter.name: workspaceName
WorkspaceNameParameter.description: The workspace name of Azure Managed Grafana.
